bibl.title: Kôm Ombo, Second Preliminary Report.
bibl.note: 259 Greek and Latin ostraca were discovered during the second campaign, 1990/1991. - Ostraca. - Official titles. - Place-names. - Names of persons. - The Roman army. - Pp. 124-125: Appendix. Publication of two ostraca: 1. Inv. 1918/25. Letter from Menenius Chares, curator to Iulius Proclus, centurio. Ist Cent. A.D. February 2-3; 2. Inv. 1920/21. Receipt for the fowler's tax. January 4, August 4 and 30, 1 A.D.
WAGNER Guy, Kôm Ombo, Second Preliminary Report.
